name: Sicko Sanctum: Megahecks
storyline: Griffith, having made it to the bottom of the Monolith of Foolery, so close to forgiveness of their crimes, was killed by Martation. Now in a mysterious codified hell, Griffith must trudge through endless heaps of enemies, in hopes that they will make it out and finally get revenge on Martation.
summary: An infinite, wave-based, movement shooter that takes place in a surreal code hell. Your objective: get revenge and go beyond. With the use of unlimited upgrades, it looks easy on the surface. But with harder-than-ever enemies, special stages, and now a final boss, it's a tough time!
